name: The Revenge of The Necromancer: Dungeon Hero II
name_original: The Revenge of The Necromancer: Dungeon Hero II
description:
Years ago, a legendary hero made his way into the depths of the dungeon and defeated the mighty necromancer.

There were years of peace and everyone thought THAT the necromancer was definitely dead.

But was it really like that?

The Revenge of The Necromancer: Dungeon Hero II, is the sequel to Dungeon Hero (available for free here : https://albeerto.itch.io/dungeon-hero ).

In this sequel you can choose your hero (a warrior or a mage), find new equipment and weapons,  explore larger dungeons and fight more challenging monsters ... all with improved animations and pixel art graphics!

Can you kill the fearsome necromancer once and for all?
